summary: Olivier is from Brussels. He worked for several years for Atos, either directly or indirectly, as a Java Developer and used his skills for various customers including Base Company, the Service Public Wallonie, the Cliniques Saint-Luc and the Belgian mutualities and syndicates. He keeps himself up to date in various technologies including Java and Web Development. Olivier loves working in teams and is looking into developping for large scaled systems.

works.description: M-Live is a company selling professional musical diffusion systems
highlights: Implementation of a tool to manage the billing, the customers and the resources.

works.description: Saint-Luc is a Belgian hospital located in Brussels
highlights: Analysis and development of tool managing the recording and handling of patients' consultation requests. This tool is still used as of today.

works.description: Bluevision is a web development and hosting company, focused on providing full-integrated e-commerce solutions to small and medium-sized companies.
highlights: Analysis and development of extensions to osCommerce to be used as customizations for the final customers.

works.description: The Belgian Telecom Competency Center project was created to provide fully integrated back-end management to telecom companies, more specifically to Base Company
highlights: Analysis and development of customizations in relation to the customer management, the provisioning and the number portability.
Support and maintenance of the service SMS router system.
Several upgrades of the technologies used.

works.description: The Belgian Telecom Competency Center project was created to provide fully integrated back-end management to telecom companies, more specifically to Base Company
highlights: Analysis and development of customizations in relation to the customer management, the provisioning and the number portability.
Support and maintenance of the service SMS router system.
Several upgrades of the technologies used.

works.description: The SPW project inside of Atos Belgium creates and manages the Car Tax application for the Service Public Wallonie
highlights: Analysis and development of fixes for the long-standing bugs.

works.description: The Electronic C3 is the replacement from a physical to an electronic card for the unemployed to register their days
highlights: Creation of the backend applications with a focus on keeping the privacy data secure.
Handling of the communication to both the frontend application and the paying organisms (syndicates and CAPAC).
Development of monitoring tools, guaranteeing a 99.5% uptime of the application.
Maintenance of the application after launch

works.customer: Collège Intermutualiste National - Nationaal Intermutualistisch College
works.description: The NIPPIN project handles the communications between all the care providers and the Belgian mutualities
highlights: Creation and delivery of a platform to securely integrate the data from the mutualities in order to improve its availability uptime.
Creation and delivery of a tool for doctors to check the refund amounts from each mutualities.

works.description: Tech Mahindra is Base Company's current backoffice provider
highlights: Support of the upgrade of Java and WebLogic for the previously written application, see "Belgian Telecom Compentency Center"

education.institution: Centre Scolaire du Sacré-Cœur de Jette

trainings.label: Sun Certified Programmer for the Java Platform, SE 6
Oracle Certified Associate, Java SE 7 Programmer
Oracle Certified Professional, Java SE 7 Programmer

languages.fluency: Fluent speaking and reading, basic writing
